Talk1006:
<sp:3:0:2:0301>I can't seem to catch a single runaway
bird, let alone all <clr:0000>five<clr:ffff>!

If those missing <clr:0000>Cuccos <clr:ffff>aren't <clr:0000>inside the
fence <clr:ffff>soon, the folks at the stable are
gonna be decidedly not thrilled.
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>Where are they? They <clr:0000>can't have gone
too far<clr:ffff>, right?
Talk1007:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>*sigh* I guess that waiting for anything
that's flown the coop is useless.
Talk1009:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Scare_00>Argh, it's no use! What should I do?
I need to sort this out, and fast, or I'm
going to be in big trouble...
Talk1030:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>Thank you! But remember, they all need
to be <clr:0000>inside the fence <clr:ffff>or else they might
go running off again.
Talk1043:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>Four Cuccos down, one to go. This <clr:0000>last
one<clr:ffff>'s bound to be the smartest. How else
could it have evaded capture so long?
Talk1031:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>Yup! That's where the Cuccos belong,
<clr:0000>inside the fence<clr:ffff>. Great work.
Talk1033:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01>Huh? There aren't as many Cuccos
as there were before!
Talk1021:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>I'm so, so grateful, but...<sp:5:1:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0a01>There were five <clr:0000>Cuccos <clr:ffff>that ran away,
which means <clr:0000>one is still out there<clr:ffff>.
That one might be difficult to catch.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>But it must be close to this stable.
It has to be!<sp:5:1:0> Right?
Talk1023:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Scare_00>Argh, it's no use! What should I do?
It's raining too... I need to sort this out,
and fast.
Talk1010:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Scare_01>They can't have gone far, right?
But where are they?!
Talk1024:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_00>You did it!<sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:0:4:0>It's almost embarrassing... After all your
help with the meat-and-rice-bowl incident,
you've saved my hide yet again.
<sp:0:2:2:7d00>You're my hero!<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:2:2:6400>


<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Notice_00>It's just... How do I put this? I really
don't want anyone to know the, ah,
you-know-whats went missing.
<sp:3:0:2:0001>So... <sp:5:0:0>Here.
Talk1026:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01>Your Cucco search is coming along
nicely, huh?
Talk1001:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:Runaway_01><sp:0:2:2:7d00>AAAH! Forgive me!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:2:2:6400>


<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:SurpriseS_00>...Oh! I mistook you for somebody else.
Maybe don't sneak up on a guy who's
clearly having a bad day.
<sp:0:2:2:5000>I was sure you were someone from the stable...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk1027:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:Notice_01>Oh! How about that? <sp:5:1:0>One of the missing
Cuccos is back in there already.
Talk1014:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>They must be near the stable, but where?


I have to get them back <clr:0000>inside the fence<clr:ffff>,
and fast...
Talk1028:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_00>You're the guy who saved us after that
mishap with the monster parts, right?
Whew... <sp:5:0:0>Talk about a bad meal.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Say... <sp:5:0:0>Being as you're such a helpful sort,
maybe you can help me out of the bind
I'm in now.
Talk1002:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>There used to be six Cuccos here, see.
And I was hungry, and I figured where
there are Cuccos, there are eggs.
But when I got close...<sp:5:1:0>all except one flew
away! Now it looks like I stole them!

<sp:3:0:2:0301>Do you know what happens to Cucco
thieves around here? <sp:5:0:0>Well, neither do I.
But probably nothing good!
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Think_00>I know what you're thinking. "How far
could they get with those little wings?
They must be <clr:0000>nearby<clr:ffff>!"<sp:5:0:0>
And you'd be right about that. <sp:5:0:0>But as
soon as I get close, they'll scram!

I really need to get the other <clr:0000>five <clr:ffff>Cuccos
<clr:0000>back inside the fence <clr:ffff>before someone
from the stable finds out...
Talk1029:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Notice_01>Huh? <sp:5:1:0>Wha? <sp:5:0:0>Looks like someone's been
helping with my missing <clr:0000>Cuccos<clr:ffff>!
Talk1004:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad_01>I have to get those <clr:0000>Cuccos <clr:ffff>back <clr:0000>inside the
fence<clr:ffff>, or the folks at the stable will have
my hide...
Talk1018:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>You might think of this as "hush money,"
and... <sp:5:1:0>Yes. That's what it is.

<sp:3:0:2:0101>But the operative word there is "money."
You like money, don't you? So take it!

<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_00>Now, let's both pretend like this never
happened. Farewell!
